===User creation===

Users cannot be created by default. To allow the creation,
go to "Users -> Users settings" page, check "Enable users creation" and
fill in the "Registration mail" witch is used to send the confirmation email.

===Note on the wiki deletion===
You can delete a wiki with the web interface in: "Wiki -> View all wikis"

Please, enable Javascript.

If you click on "Delete", a confirmation window will appears.
If you click on "Ok", all data will be erased (see the following "Note")

Note: The deletion is not secure for the moment.
- Please note that will be delete all content related
  (content, wikiboxes, wikipages).
- Please verify there is no links to the wiki and no wikiboxes accessible.
